column2: an A.M. Eatery////Our food came out fairly quickly
column3: and we were not disappointed. The portion sizes were pretty big for two college-age women
column4: so we ended up taking a lot of the food to go. The cannoli pancake was a bit sweet for me
column5: but I adored the pineapple upside down and blueberry danish ones. Specialty pancakes are one of my weaknesses
column6: and let's just say that Snooze pancakes took my breath away. The Benny we ordered was similarly tasty
column7: but didn't seem as inspired as the rest of the menu. My next time here
column8: I'd like to try one of the meat Benny options to see how it compares.
